column4: hey ppl........i am going to a friends place to install ubuntu on XP machine......anything i need to know? (havent used XP much)
does he have a special drive setup?
System Rescue CD comes with a nice bootmanager a little more compatible than GRUB
good luck ;) but, always keep that in your toolbox henceforth
if you install GRUB to MBR, all should work fine
C-a scrolls to the beginning of the line, you idiot ;)
C-a = select all in winblows (new convert) :)
better support for smaller files, like an MP3 collection
my policy is not to blindly make memorize, but to teach
also has the most memory leaks, its bloated, and other flaws
